name: Aalto’s Adventure (2021 - 1)
description:
Enjoy your endless odyssey through the underwater relics. 

Inspired by Alto's Adventure, this is a project created for the course "Game Project" from Aalto University Master's Degree in Game Design & Production (2021).

How to Play

Press "Space" to start

Press "Space" to jump

Hold "Space" to roll

Press "R" to restart

Credits

Art: Sarah Alirezaee
Programming: Jinda Li
Music: Mikko Saarinen
